stdout:
Table	Create Table
member_profiles	CREATE TABLE `member_profiles` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `displayName` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `avatarIcon` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'mushroom-1',
  `avatarColor` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '#8B5CF6',
  `bio` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `joinReasons` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `journeyStage` enum('researching','preparing','started','experienced','guide') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'researching',
  `isPublic` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `postCount` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `commentCount` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `joinedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `member_profiles_userId_unique` (`userId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
